first_translate: is siegren  going to be my partner for tonight’s ball?
I haven’t asked him yet.
then you’ll go with me instead.

hangle: 공작님에게 해 달라고 한 적 없는데요?
first_translate: but father,  I never said that I wanted you as my escort...
well, if not siegren, then there is no one else but me.

hangle: 하지만 성인이 되어 보호자와 가는 건 촌스러운 일이잖아요.
first_translate: besides, isn’t it childish for someone like me to attend such events with their guardian?
it doesn’t matter what others think.
I’m your father after all.
abel... why are you being so sweet today?
didn’t I just make you feel touched by how thoughtful I was?
if you’re really moved, call me “father.”
fine...
give back those feelings right now.
lady fiona has arrived.
she came here with duke abel.
we must greet our host first.
right.
not that I want to though.
r-right...  abel isn’t exactly close with the imperial family.
my goodness.

hangle: 설마 공작이 여기에 올 줄은 몰랐군요.
first_translate: I didn’t expect his grace would come at all.
your majesty invited us herself.
of course we had to accept her invitation.
and may I ask who this young lady beside you is?
a pleasure to meet you, your majesty.
I am fiona halyeon.
ah yes,
the adopted daughter of duke halyeon.
I’ve heard quite a lot about you.
having your adoptive father as your partner for tonight’s event is rather rare.

hangle: 아직 제 눈에 차는 상대가 없기에.
first_translate: that’s because none of them have caught my eye yet.

hangle: 와, 코앞에서 이런 말을 들으니 부끄러워.
first_translate: oh wow! hearing something like that from up close makes me blush.
you seem very fond of your adopted daughter.

hangle: 보아하니 제가 피오나 영애에 대해 들은 소문은 전부 오해였나 봅니다?
first_translate: from what I see, everything I heard about lady fiona seems to be false rumors.
indeed they were.

hangle: 제가 모르는 걸 보니 신경 쓸 가치가 없는 이야기인 게 분명하군요.
first_translate: as long as you don’t know anything about it, it’s best to ignore whatever people say.

hangle: 고아하신 황후 폐하마저 그런 소문에 휘둘리고 계신 건 아니길 바랍니다.
first_translate: I hope even your majesty hasn’t been swayed by any baseless gossip.

hangle: 공작의 그 당당한 태도는 몇 년 동안 똑같군요.
first_translate: your attitude remains unchanged over these years, your grace.
yes, indeed. nothing ever changes when it comes to him.

hangle: 어떻게 나이를 먹어도 여전히 건방지니? 라는 말 아냐?
first_translate: or maybe she meant to say, “how can you still remain arrogant despite growing older?”

hangle: 황후 폐하는 뵐 때마다 괄목하게 되는군요.
first_translate: every time I see your majesty, I always find myself amazed.

hangle: 고귀한 분답게 세월의 흐름을 순순히 받아들이시는 모습이 보기 좋습니다.
first_translate: it’s nice seeing you graciously accepting the passage of time.
no, she probably meant to say, “you look much older than before.”

hangle: 괜히 아벨이 중앙에서 지원을 못 받는 게 아니었어.
first_translate: now I understand why abel doesn’t get support from anyone in central pandora.
this feels like treading on eggshells around here...
excuse me for interrupting--
prince siegren.
prince siegren,
interrupting while we’re talking is rude!
I apologize, your majesty.
lady fiona.
yes?

hangle: 같이 시간을 보내는 걸 허락해 주겠나.
first_translate: may I spend some time with you tonight?
so he wants to take you away from me.
no, you cannot.
what do you mean, abel?
why don’t we hear what lady fiona thinks?
o-of course.
an honor.
s-siegren?!
wh-why does it feel like he’s trying to seduce me?!
then excuse us, your majesties.
let’s leave.
siegren,
are you alright?
alright? what do you mean?
I’m referring to your behavior earlier.
what did I do wrong?
I-I don’t know how to put this into words...
it felt like you were flirting with me or something.

hangle: 하지만 손등에 입을 맞추는 건 사교계에서는 늘 있는 일이고…
first_translate: but kissing the hand is common etiquette among nobles...
fiona.

hangle: 다른 놈들이 널 쳐다보고 있어서 일부러 그랬어.
first_translate: I only did that since everyone was staring at you.

hangle: 이제야 내 태도가 좀 눈에 들어오나 봐?
first_translate: do you finally notice how I act toward you?
oh.
today really is strange...
fiona.
yeah?
why did you stay behind?
last time, you told me to help you out whenever possible.
I remember.

hangle: 하지만 내 부탁이라면 다 들어줄 생각이야?
first_translate: but will you listen to every request I make?
as long as I can fulfill it.
as long as you can...
looks like your tie needs fixing again.
then tell me, fiona.
yeah?
why do you intend to grant my requests?
well,
there.
all fixed.
it’s because you’re precious to me...
s-siegren?
seriously...

hangle: 정말 사람 헷갈리게 하는 데 일가견이 있어…
first_translate: you’re good at confusing people...
confusing people?
forget it.

hangle: 네가 자꾸 그러니 나도 마음대로 할 거야.
first_translate: since you keep doing things like that, I’ll also do as I please too.
fiona.
apparently,  a big night market is opening downtown tomorrow evening.
really?
that sounds fun.
meet me there.
I’d love to go somewhere alone together, just the two of us.
